MEP profile

Gerard BATTEN
Independence/Democracy Group
Member
United Kingdom
 
UK Independence Party
Born on 27 March 1954, London 		 

Member
Subcommittee on Security and Defence [See]

Substitute
Committee on Foreign Affairs [See]

Curriculum vitae
Hand bookbinder (1972-1976). Manager, British Telecom (1976-2004).
In the UK Independence Party: founder member (1993); Member of the National Executive Committee (1993-1997; (2002- ); Party Secretary (1994-1997).
